text: Richard James Biggs II (March 18, 1960 â€“ May 22, 2004) was an American television and stage actor. He was known for his roles on the television series Days of Our Lives and Babylon 5. Biggs collapsed at his home in Los Angeles, and died at Providence Saint Joseph Medical Center of complications stemming from aortic dissection on May 22, 2004. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1960 births Category:2004 deaths Category:African- American actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Columbus, Ohio Category:Deaths from aortic dissection Category:Disease-related deaths in California
